0: We were moved to two rooms on the ninth floor that were updated and quiet from the street noise
With Hyde Park as a view and Dinner by Heston Blumenthal as a convenient dining option it is really hard to go wrong here particularly if you prefer older traditional marquis hotels
Room is very classy but it is not something spectacular

This hotel in my opinion has been downgraded from a Fabulous 5 Start to a Shaby 3 Star Everytime we opened our door to go outside we would find the housekeeper standing outside our room with her cell phone in her hand we found this to be very annoying not happening only once but everythime
The room prices are same as hotels in the top 10 in London so why stay here
We ordered room service breakfast twice during our stay
The courtyard room although comfortable was very dark and the bathroom was minuscule
Requested for two bed room arrived to find beds not separated
The room was very tired looking shabby round the edges scratches marks spy hole spins pictures on the wall not straight fixed slightly off so one can not correct etc
Also I forgot to mention there is no iron in the room but there is an ironing service at a cost
1: From the moment my boyfriend and I walked through the doors we were greeted by warm and friendly agents and whisked away to our room I typically hate lengthy check ins and they made the experience quick and easy
Huge rooms with nice little treats placed out for kids very thoughtful
Beautiful room very stylish and comfortable
Lamb room service was very service station
The shower was seriously good and the bed comfortable
Everything have been renovated my room was A hyde Park view and it was perfect

We were here for 5 nights shortly after they reopened from their renovation rates varied each night from £ 840 to £ 1040Our room was well appointed with nice lighting a large flat screen TV plenty of hanging space and drawers for clothes and a nice bathroom with heated toilet seat heated towel rack and an overhead “ rain ” shower head
I enjoy a light breakfast and after a short wait my room was ready
Also the room overlooking Hyde park was amazing it was well appointed very comfortable and a beautiful view
The room was spacious and very clean
